website_summaries.verdict: Although this product may not be for you if you prefer natural ingredients, it's definitely beneficial at moisturizing hair and repairing damage. A great choice for waves, curls, and coils.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for smoothing frizz and improving damage like dry hair and split ends
Defines curls and leaves them feeling soft and resilient
Suitable for different textures and types of curls, including waves and tight coils
From one of the world's most respected hair care brands
cons: Compared to other products we considered, this one contains more chemical ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this is not the authentic product. I have the real stuff from the hair salon and this is not the same product. Different smell, texture, and does not work! The real product is amazing. This one is a fake. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Saghar J.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical buying the product thinking it may be a fake, but when I use the product my hair is silky smooth for a whole day! So worth the $, by far the best hair mask I've ever used. Briogeo, living proof, amika, morcoon oil, macadamia, shisedo all didn't do anything for my hair compared to this gem 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer He

customer_reviews.title: This may be a fake
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought this product direct from L'Oreal directly. However this product has a different (less attractive) smell, thicker consistency, and behaves differently on my hair (less moisturizing effect, rinses less cleanly). For those reasons this product as sold on Amazon may be a fake. Buyer beware! I have recently re-ordered from L'Oreal's website directly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Forisha

customer_reviews.title: Reverses damage
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair that gets highlights, heat styled, dry shampoo, etc. Kerastase mask forgives me for doing all of that to my hair. This product is so good, it really makes my hair look and feel healthy again. When I have time, I like to leave it on for an hour or more. I always have a jar of this in my shower and when I travel I take a small amount to use as conditioner. The only con is the price but I love it so much I'm willing to pay for a top quality product.
customer_reviews.author: sharwill

customer_reviews.title: I live in a desert climate. I have slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a desert climate. I have slightly dry, natural wave, and slightly frizzy hair. I tried Kerastase Discipline Masque and have found it helps the frizz and dryness some. It has a pleasant scent too. I can go every 2-4 days without washing and use this every time for conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Manageable
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about Kerastase! I was only using Discipline Fluidissime which is also a great product but my hair does not do well in humidity so I decided to try the shampoo & conditioner and mask and all I can say is WOW! What a difference! My hair looks great! Soft & Manageable! A little pricey, more than what I am use to spending but well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B.

customer_reviews.title: I think it was a fake. I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a fake. I had to buy original product as my hair is damaged after blondes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think I received a dupe. This product leaves a rotten cheese smell. My hair has been super dry after using this even thought it’s supposed to do the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth hair, less frizz, easier to untangle
customer_reviews.text: I had already used this product before. It’s great, it’s pretty much the only thing that tames my hair (I have colored hair). This makes my hair much smoother, less frizzy and soooo much easier to untangle.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Like the smooth but not the silicone
customer_reviews.text: Trying to stay away from hair products that coat the hair and eventually dry it out. Now that I know about it, I’m giving up any hair product with dimethicone (or similar silicone ingredients).
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think it could get any better then I tried Discipline Bain
customer_reviews.text: I've always had frizzy hair but Kerastase has been a gift. Didn't think it could get any better then I tried Discipline Bain. I'm not kidding people noticed how soft my hair looked and felt! I'm almost 50 and nobody's ever said that! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Generic, not authentic
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work well at all made my hair stringy I’m thinking it could be generic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! It made my hair so smooth and shiny! It really helped with the frizz on the very first use. I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: My barber recommended this product to me to change the texture of my coarse hair. It didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time very good brand and etc
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time very good brand and etc. But I really didn't see any difference in my hair. I brought because someone told me that the smell was sweet and adorable. Maybe not in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: FAKE & NON-REFUNDABLE :(
customer_reviews.text: FAKE! FAKE! FAKE! And non-refundable!! So disappointed!! I’ve used this product for years and this is NOT the correct formula!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH M.

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra and get the REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not authentic product. I have purchased from salon and thought I would save a little money. I knew right away from the cellophane packaging it was not authentic and texture of product is totally off. I tried anyway just to see. My hair was awful. Pay extra and stick with the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: TeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have found for my hair in a long time. It has been wonderfull for hair which gets a heavy workout with hot irons and blow dryers. I love the scent which some may find heavy but I enjoy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Ann

customer_reviews.title: Part of the Kerastase line for dry hair, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Part of the Kerastase line for dry hair, the Discipline Maskeratine imparts moisture and heals all wounds from chemical processing, blowdrying, ironing and more. It's pricey, but worth it. Don't even try reading the directions or ingredients, unless you speak French and have a magnifying glass. Apply to pre washed, damp hair and leave in for 30 minutes. This is a deep conditioner, and at this price you don't want to be in a rush to rinse.
customer_reviews.author: connie karcher

customer_reviews.title: No, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the same quality as the original product. I am unsure if it was substituted/swapped or old but it was a different consistency and it did not condition my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I've used Kerastase products a lot over the year, and this didn't have the right texture/smell. Not 100% sure if it's a fake product, but returning nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: great product and will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my hair. great product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!!! Leaves my unruly, dry, damaged, brittle hair silky soft and healthy. Great scent too!!
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Keratase+Amazon=👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love the Keratase line of products . I’m so glad I can order them online . I ordered the mask conditioner and got it the very next day 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: K.L. from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: This treatment has a pleasant smell and leaves hair soft and shinny. I originally purchased it at a salon and then again on amazon. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes my hair real smooth and good for colored hair. Hair does not fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Torres

customer_reviews.title: Best value conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I will Never order another conditioner again. This product last so long and actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Berzak

customer_reviews.title: Great for fly away and frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: Hair feels very soft and really seems to help with the frizzy hair when used after the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair with small amount
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair smooth even with very small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years! Love the way it works with my thick coarse hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller box
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but sent in a huge box and I spent too much money on the shipoing because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product my hair is much manageable and smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product my hair is much manageable and smooth love this whole line. It really works I tried every expensive hair products and this is the best. The seller is excellent very fast shipment
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Got the product faster than anticipated and was happy with the size of the container for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the product faster than anticipated and was happy with the size of the container for the price and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: England0719

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It leaves my hair silky smooth and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great thickness to help coat frizzy, hair and make it manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Casseva

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Mask
customer_reviews.text: Really nice thick product. Smells great, I really like this Kerastase line of products!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite hair mask! It may be priced high but this product is well worth every penny! This is a guaranteed GREAT HAIR product for all hair types
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Mask. My hair was smooth, shine and soft .
customer_reviews.author: Felipe R Uliani

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but works.
customer_reviews.text: My hair look less frizzy (I have naturally curly hair) and is very soft. It's a little pricey but worth it when you want to look extra great.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Mom

customer_reviews.title: Strong perfumed product
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really on the strong side (like someone mentioned before). The conditioning result is average, so not up to my standard to Kerastase products I've been using for years now. I thought I could stand it and use the whole jar up - but only have to return it because the perfume smell literally made me headache..the original product is simply better.
customer_reviews.author: ARDNAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. A little goes a long way so it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Sharma

customer_reviews.title: use this product and your hair will look great!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner has helped restore my damaged frizzy hair. It can still get frizzy on a humid or rainy day, but the shine is back. My husband has noticed a big difference. Get a trim, don't use the hot setting too long on the dryer, use this product and your hair will look great!
customer_reviews.author: maryannofgeorgetown

customer_reviews.title: This new Kerastase Discipline mask works great my daughters and my wavy and frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This new Kerastase Discipline mask works great my daughters and my wavy and frizzy hair. I have been using Brazilian Blowout Shampoo, Conditioner, and mask for 2 years. This Kerastase works much better. I don't have to use the flat iron as much as I did with the Brazilian Blowout products. Try it, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: authentic?? not sure?
customer_reviews.text: I have static in hair any time I use this. I wont buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this mask from a salon before and its amazing. It makes your hair feel so soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this mask from a salon before and its amazing. It makes your hair feel so soft and healthy. I think the one I purchased off amazon is either expired or not authentic because it makes my hair feel so dry and brittle. Don't make the same mistake, buy this from an authorized salon.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Clark

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I did not think this product was any better than the other Loreal products I have purchased locally for a lot less money. Actually, a little baby oil or argan oil in the palm of your hand before blow drying will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used all the time they are perfect and good product
customer_reviews.author: criselda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for blow drying curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, for a curly girl who uses Shea Butter and Coconut oil every other day, this mask doesn't feel as moisturizing to my curls. HOWEVER, when I use this product to blow dry my hair, it is truly a miracle product! My hair is absolutely shiny, smooth, frizz-free, and non-greasy that other expensive beauty store heat protectors could never pull off (as a curly girl, I have a heaping pile of products that just don't work). I'm so happy with the results that I bought another one to keep as back up. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: kmg123

customer_reviews.title: SILKY TRESSES
customer_reviews.text: This product works fantastically for my wavy hair! I get color and highlights every month and that is rough on your hair! Once a week I condition my hair with this product and let it set for 30 min after combing it through. It makes my hair so silky and wavy! It's my go to deep conditioner, other products don't work as well and only this does the job for my type of wavy hair!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medicine for your hair
customer_reviews.text: This product helped to make my hair grow longer by preventing split ends and making it so soft and full. I only wash my hair about twice a week and always slather this product on and leave it for a few minutes. It really is wonderful. I hate the packaging though. The top is wide and difficult to open with slippery hands. It is expensive, but last a long time if you only use it once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Not the product I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t smell or feel like the product I bought in my salon. It’s very thick, heavy, I’m not fond of it. I may have purchased the wrong product. Was packaged well—I think I’ll stick with buying from salon. Thanks to seller for quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: kcinbloom

customer_reviews.title: Defined Curls
customer_reviews.text: ITS THE BEST. I DONT EVEN HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT USING A HAIRDRYER. IT EVEN MAKES MY HAIR LOOKING WITH SOME WELL DEFINED CURLS I DIDNT EVEN KNEW I HAD. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: newatis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you use with other products of the same line
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask. Needs to be used with shampoo of the same line. Finish with the leave in milk. My hair is super straight, and colored/bleached. Never been so healthy
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. It didn't even work anywhere near as well as the lightweight conditioner from this line. Then, I realized the packaging and label on the front didn't look like the one from the Kerastase website (solid copper colored top, different sized K on the label, etc.), even though it came in a box with cellophane wrapping. I hate to leave a negative review of this item because it may very well work if it is the real deal, but since I am reviewing the item I received, it deserves one star at best. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: Get Control of Your Hair.
customer_reviews.text: This make the most tangly, uncontrolled hair manageable and silky soft. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN

customer_reviews.title: This is probably a fake.
customer_reviews.text: It looked like the real thing. This did not smell the same. It was also almost $20 cheaper. I should have known better by comparing the price.
customer_reviews.author: CDEL

customer_reviews.title: Great hair mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner! First time with this mask. I have used other Kerastase but this has become my new favorite. Thick and creamy. Some of my others were a tad watery. Grabs the hair better and less waste. Hair is silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: drfitmindandbody

customer_reviews.title: It works if u flat iron ur hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it left my hair soft, shiny and my hair color is so vibrant. Use it with heat only..
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask, it is definitely authentic. My bleached blonde hair has recovered since I started using it. I also rub a little bit of it on my hair as a leave-in and it works great. Approved!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product. I gave into ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product. I gave into temptation because it was half the price I pay at the Salon, but this was not an authentic product. I compared the box to the salon version and the actual conditioner did not smell the same. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtybirdy

customer_reviews.title: No more frizzy hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on Wednesday and my hair is silky smooth and no frizz!! With the heat and humidity in FL this is a must have product!! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bretonne

customer_reviews.title: Iam glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Take a chance and try it ! Iam glad I did . Outstanding smoothing especially on my keratin treated hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: my hair is very stubborn and frizzy. I heard ...
customer_reviews.text: my hair is very stubborn and frizzy. I heard wonders about this product, unfortunately, no product has been able to tame my frizzy hair yet...including this one.
customer_reviews.author: pcu5588

customer_reviews.title: The best hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Very best product! My hair say me Thank you!!! Good result after I used it!!! Buy it
customer_reviews.author: mauro s.

customer_reviews.title: it does help to control frizz - strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This condition does help to control frizz better than other products I have used so far
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask that I apply directly after shampooing! Great! Leaves my hair feeling great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: best mask i have tried so far from kerastase
customer_reviews.text: best mask i have tried so far from kerastase , it smells unbelievably yummy , and leaves my hair shiny , silky i am just in love with it , definitely must have ...
customer_reviews.author: mariko

customer_reviews.title: I went for my regularly scheduled appointment and my hairdresser asked if I was using something new because my hair felt like straw. I showed her this and she read ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of times of using this my hair became really dry and brittle but I didn't make the connection. I went for my regularly scheduled appointment and my hairdresser asked if I was using something new because my hair felt like straw. I showed her this and she read the ingredients. Her response "I can't believe they sell this stuff online. You have to really know how to use these types of products or they can destroy your hair."
customer_reviews.author: cakinn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for my hair; makes my hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: MGD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps my long thick hair from tangling. Keeps it smooth and easy to comb.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick long and straight hair who tends to Break easily. But this mask really makes a difference that you feel for long time...
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best conditioner I have found for my frizzy hair. Makes my hair silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: First Kerastase Product to Leave my Hair Coarse
customer_reviews.text: I've been using various Kerastase products for over a year. My stylist also uses these products and recommended them. This purchase was the first time using this particular line within Kerastase but I believed it would be just a good as all of the others on my hair. WRONG. This product left my hair like a cheap drug store product. My hair was very course, not soft at all. The other Kerastase products leave my hair very very soft and using this product was a disaster for me. I am plan on taking this product to my stylist shop to compare with what they have because its hard to believe this product went so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SachaJean

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful for my thick hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for my thick hair, a comb floats through my hair, even when wet. It smells divine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is pricey but worth it... ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pricey but worth it...it's turned my hair around. My hairstylist claims this is the only brand that actually will change your hair, and now I believe her!
customer_reviews.author: LaJolie

customer_reviews.title: garnier whole blends is a lot better for only
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for me, garnier whole blends is a lot better for only $6
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is liquid gold. This is a luxury conditioner and the results prove it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi RamoneTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: By far the best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I put my hair through hell & this product brings it back to life, LOVE IT!!! Already on my 2nd jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scent is so over powering that I can't even use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, has more alcohol than a bottle of alcohol ...
customer_reviews.text: Misleading, has more alcohol than a bottle of alcohol it has three diff types of alcohol. everyone knows alcohol dries up ur hair. the product does not specify the ingredients. its expensive alcohol. compny wants u to pay the shipping charges back to get reimbursed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coleman

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara ever! LOVE it and smells awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Pfaff

product_meta.title: Kerastase Discipline Maskeratine Mask 6.8 oz
product_meta.description: Kerastase Discipline Maskeratine Smooth-in-Motion Masque High Concentration, 6.8 Ounce
feature_bullets: It provides maximum frizz control, extreme softness and suppleness
It is recommended for everyday use
